meanings.sent1: The univariate analysis focused on just one factor.
meanings.sent2: The researcher conducted a univariate study to analyze the impact of temperature.
meanings.sent3: The univariate graph looked so lonely with only one line.
meanings.sent4: Her univariate approach to problem-solving simplified the complex issue.
meanings.sent5: The concept of univariate analysis means looking at things one at a time.

meanings.sent1: The univariate equation only had one unknown.
meanings.sent2: In statistics, univariate data analysis deals with a single variable at a time.
meanings.sent3: The univariate experiment felt like juggling with just one ball.
meanings.sent4: His univariate model simplified the prediction process.
meanings.sent5: Understanding univariate statistics is crucial for analyzing individual variables.
